attributes.action: Make Bebo UK's Official Social Network
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should show support for this online social network and be involved in safety of it's users! as it is the main  social network used by the youth of the UK!

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
